amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a new paragraph in lieu of the matter proposed to be inserted by the Burgess amendment to section 3. The new matter seeks to insert text regarding strategies to minimize emissions from infrastructure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 185 (Roll no. 81).

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Eshoo to the Burgess amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Eshoo to the Burgess amendment (A001).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 185 (Roll no. 81).
